SEARCH
Package ca.mcgill.nalmer.lsutilities.controller

Class LsUsersController

java.lang.Object
ca.mcgill.nalmer.lsutilities.controller.LsUsersController
public final class LsUsersController extends Object
LS Users Controller. Corresponds to the '/api/users' and '/api/online' routes.
Since:
1.0
Author:
Nicolas Almerge

  • Method Details

    • getNumberOfUsers

      public static int getNumberOfUsers()
      Gets the number of User. Corresponds to GET '/api/online'.
      Returns:
      Number of registered User.

    • getAllUsers

      public static User[] getAllUsers(String accessToken)
      Gets all the User. Corresponds to GET '/api/users'.
      Parameters:
      accessToken - Access token (UserRole.ROLE_ADMIN required).
      Returns:
      Array of all User.
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if accessToken is null.

    • getAllUsers

      public static User[] getAllUsers(OauthToken token)
      Gets all the User. Corresponds to GET '/api/users'.
      Parameters:
      token - Access token (UserRole.ROLE_ADMIN required).
      Returns:
      Array of all User.
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if token is null.

    • getUser

      public static User getUser(String username, String accessToken)
      Gets all the User information from a specific username. Corresponds to GET '/api/users/{user}'.
      Parameters:
      username - Username to query.
      accessToken - Access token (UserRole.ROLE_ADMIN required, or token of the specified user).
      Returns:
      User information.
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if username or accessToken is null.

    • getUser

      public static User getUser(String username, OauthToken token)
      Gets all the User information from a specific username. Corresponds to GET '/api/users/{user}'.
      Parameters:
      username - Username to query.
      token - Access token (UserRole.ROLE_ADMIN required, or token of the specified user).
      Returns:
      User information.
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if username or token is null.

    • addUser

      public static void addUser(String username, String password, String preferredColor, UserRole role, String accessToken)
      Adds a new User. Corresponds to PUT '/api/users/{user}'.
      Parameters:
      username - Username.
      password - Password (plain text).
      preferredColor - Preferred color.
      role - User role.
      accessToken - Access token (UserRole.ROLE_ADMIN required).
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if username, password, preferredColor, role or accessToken is null.

    • addUser

      public static void addUser(String username, String password, String preferredColor, UserRole role, OauthToken token)
      Adds a new User. Corresponds to PUT '/api/users/{user}'.
      Parameters:
      username - Username.
      password - Password (plain text).
      preferredColor - Preferred color.
      role - User role.
      token - Access token (UserRole.ROLE_ADMIN required).
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if username, password, preferredColor, role or accessToken is null.

    • deleteUser

      public static void deleteUser(String username, String accessToken)
      Removes a User. Corresponds to DELETE '/api/users/{username}'.
      Parameters:
      username - Username to delete.
      accessToken - Access token (UserRole.ROLE_ADMIN required, but users cannot delete themselves, even admins).
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if username or accessToken is null.

    • deleteUser

      public static void deleteUser(User user, String accessToken)
      Removes a User. Corresponds to DELETE '/api/users/{user}'.
      Parameters:
      user - User to delete.
      accessToken - Access token (UserRole.ROLE_ADMIN required, but users cannot delete themselves, even admins).
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if user or accessToken is null.

    • deleteUser

      public static void deleteUser(String username, OauthToken token)
      Removes a User. Corresponds to DELETE '/api/users/{username}'.
      Parameters:
      username - Username to delete.
      token - Access token (UserRole.ROLE_ADMIN required, but users cannot delete themselves, even admins).
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if username or token is null.

    • deleteUser

      public static void deleteUser(User user, OauthToken token)
      Removes a User. Corresponds to DELETE '/api/users/{user}'.
      Parameters:
      user - User to delete.
      token - Access token (UserRole.ROLE_ADMIN required, but users cannot delete themselves, even admins).
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if user or token is null.

    • updatePassword

      public static void updatePassword(String username, String oldPass, String newPass, String accessToken)
      Updates a User's password. Corresponds to POST '/api/users/{username}/password'.
      Parameters:
      username - Username to change password from.
      oldPass - Old password (not verified if admin token specified).
      newPass - New password.
      accessToken - Access token (UserRole.ROLE_ADMIN required, or token of the specified user).
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if username, oldPass, newPass or accessToken is null.

    • updatePassword

      public static void updatePassword(String username, String oldPass, String newPass, OauthToken token)
      Updates a User's password. Corresponds to POST '/api/users/{username}/password'.
      Parameters:
      username - Username to change password from.
      oldPass - Old password (not verified if admin token specified).
      newPass - New password.
      token - Access token (UserRole.ROLE_ADMIN required, or token of the specified user).
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if username, oldPass, newPass or token is null.

    • updatePassword

    • setNewPassword

      public static void setNewPassword(String username, String newPass, String accessToken)
      Updates a User's password - no need to specify the old password, so an admin role is required. Corresponds to POST '/api/users/{username}/password'.
      Parameters:
      username - Username to change password from.
      newPass - New password.
      accessToken - Access token (UserRole.ROLE_ADMIN required).
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if username, newPass or accessToken is null.

    • setNewPassword

      public static void setNewPassword(String username, String newPass, OauthToken token)
      Updates a User's password - no need to specify the old password, so an admin role is required. Corresponds to POST '/api/users/{username}/password'.
      Parameters:
      username - Username to change password from.
      newPass - New password.
      token - Access token (UserRole.ROLE_ADMIN required).
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if username, newPass or token is null.

    • setNewPassword

      public static void setNewPassword(User user, String newPass, String accessToken)

      Parameters:
      user - User to change password from.
      newPass - New password.

    • getFavouriteColour

      public static String getFavouriteColour(String username, String accessToken)
      Gets a User's favourite colour. Corresponds to GET '/api/users/{username}/colour'.
      Parameters:
      username - Username to get the favourite colour from.
      accessToken - Access token (UserRole.ROLE_ADMIN required, or token of the specified user).
      Returns:
      User's favourite colour.
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if username or accessToken is null.

      newColour - New colour to change.
      accessToken - Access token (UserRole.ROLE_ADMIN required, or token of the specified user).

      NullPointerException - if username, newColour or accessToken is null.
